title: Radiology Report Generation
description: Developed R2GenTransformer, a lightweight AI framework that generates clinically accurate chest X-ray reports by integrating Swin Transformerâ€“based image analysis with lightweight LLMs, achieving high recall and fast training while running efficiently in low-resource environments.

title: Brain Tumor Classification
description: Developed a hybrid deep and machine learning system for early brain tumor detection from MRI scans, combining EfficientNet-based feature extraction with classifiers like SVM, KNN, RF, and MLP. Achieved high diagnostic accuracy while significantly reducing computational cost compared to standalone deep learning models.
